channel.title: My question pack :)
channel.description:
1: How do I make it so that an animation goes the right way if I attack a person?
E.g. I use a bow. A glowing arrow shoots out, but it always point south. So when I shoot somebody that's north of me, the arrow goes backwards. How do I make it so that the arrow always goes towards the person?
2: How do I make it when I attack somebody, the GFX appears on my character?
E.g. I have special attacks. I use Dragon Longsword and I use it's special. The animation appears on the other character at a wierd angle. The animation doesn't appear on my Dragon Longsword; it appears on the other character. How can I solve it? Picture -
[img]http://i179.photobucket.com/albums/w291/flyffhelp/untitled.jpg[/img]
3: OK, I've been to really good servers like ZdiddyScape and Trail To Hell2. Whenever I mass click on a training object on their server, it doesn't lag, meaning that while mass clicking, I click on somewhere else and in an instant my character goes there. When I mass click on a training object in my server, it lags. I try to click somewhere else and my character won't move for a long time. And when I click on an NPC once, to attack it, I click on the food and there's like a few second delay in eating it. Same with trying to move somewhere else when I want to run from an NPC. Does anybody have a code to make it anti-lag, just like those servers that I tried out?
4: Guys, I tried changing the required levels for items... I made a new character to test train on my server. I have like 38 attack and I can equip a D Hally what the fuck? And When I try to equip a D2h, it says I need 60 defence? Please, someone help!

item.title: My question pack :)
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

I don’t think they used client p in 2007.

Read full topic

item.title: My question pack :)
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

okay, some private servers have that. (for number 4) try and look around in that part. then go down to where it says defence (or just CTRL + F then type in dragon, then continue until you find Dragon halberd or something like that, then change that [under defence] to 0 or whatever you want it to be) if that doesn’t work i have no clue. For number 1 i don’t really know, but if the gfx doesn’t look like it works, then go to where ever you have the special part (or you combat part where it says like: } else if (p.equipment[3] == 11698 && p.specialAmount >= 75) { // Saradomin godsword. hitDamage = Misc.random( (int) (maxMeleeHit(p) * 1.13)); p.usingSpecial = false; p.specialAmount -= 75; p.requestAnim(7071, 0); p.requestGFX(1220, 0);
make sure it saysp.requestGFX(GFXID, 0);

That’s all i really know, but i want to know how to add in a custom special…

Read full topic

item.title: My question pack :)
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=".Kaboom, post:2, topic:105201"][quote author=gunztheduel link=topic=150736.msg1424663#msg1424663 date=1180883250]
1: How do I make it so that an animation goes the right way if I attack a person?
[/quote]

You’ll need to make a void on how to. - Won’t explain.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

2: How do I make it when I attack somebody, the GFX appears on my character?

E.g. I have special attacks. I use Dragon Longsword and I use it’s special. The animation appears on the other character at a wierd angle. The animation doesn’t appear on my Dragon Longsword; it appears on the other character. How can I solve it? Picture -

Well if you added it in attacknpc() { or attack() { change the code to this

	stillgfx(GFX#, absY, absX);

3: OK, I’ve been to really good servers like ZdiddyScape and Trail To Hell2. Whenever I mass click on a training object on their server, it doesn’t lag, meaning that while mass clicking, I click on somewhere else and in an instant my character goes there. When I mass click on a training object in my server, it lags. I try to click somewhere else and my character won’t move for a long time. And when I click on an NPC once, to attack it, I click on the food and there’s like a few second delay in eating it. Same with trying to move somewhere else when I want to run from an NPC. Does anybody have a code to make it anti-lag, just like those servers that I tried out?

Sorry mate… But if you want that kind of speed you’ll need to learn how to code your server properly to make it anti-lag or no lagg at all.

-Zdiddyscape uses HAM which is very fast connection , which might be a factor.

4: Guys, I tried changing the required levels for items… I made a new character to test train on my server. I have like 38 attack and I can equip a D Hally what the fuck? And When I try to equip a D2h, it says I need 60 defence? Please, someone help!

Oh and for this

Search for } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 20; }

And below that add.

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Weapon")) { return ##; }

Example

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon Hally")) { return 60; } [/quote]

I did your answer to 1, 2 and 4. I did that tutorial. When I click on something, the arrow only appears once. stilgfx doesn’t see to work when I use the special. I did number 4, but it says I need 60 def when I edited it in the int attack one.

Read full topic

E.g. I have special attacks. I use Dragon Longsword and I use it’s special. The animation appears on the other character at a wierd angle. The animation doesn’t appear on my Dragon Longsword; it appears on the other character. How can I solve it? Picture -[/quote]

Well if you added it in attacknpc() { or attack() { change the code to this

	stillgfx(GFX#, absY, absX);
gunztheduel:

3: OK, I’ve been to really good servers like ZdiddyScape and Trail To Hell2. Whenever I mass click on a training object on their server, it doesn’t lag, meaning that while mass clicking, I click on somewhere else and in an instant my character goes there. When I mass click on a training object in my server, it lags. I try to click somewhere else and my character won’t move for a long time. And when I click on an NPC once, to attack it, I click on the food and there’s like a few second delay in eating it. Same with trying to move somewhere else when I want to run from an NPC. Does anybody have a code to make it anti-lag, just like those servers that I tried out?

Sorry mate… But if you want that kind of speed you’ll need to learn how to code your server properly to make it anti-lag or no lagg at all.

-Zdiddyscape uses HAM which is very fast connection , which might be a factor.

gunztheduel:

4: Guys, I tried changing the required levels for items… I made a new character to test train on my server. I have like 38 attack and I can equip a D Hally what the fuck? And When I try to equip a D2h, it says I need 60 defence? Please, someone help!

Oh and for this

Search for } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 20; }

And below that add.

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Weapon")) { return ##; }

Example

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon Hally")) { return 60; }
